summary: About to introduce a newly hatched togepi to the rest of my team, a young phanpy, comfey, politoad and dragonite. An tips or...
question: About to introduce a newly hatched togepi to the rest of my team, a young phanpy, comfey, politoad and dragonite. An tips or things I should be aware of when introducing a hatchling to wide varying group?
answer:
Other than potential jealousy for your attention and the challenges of training two very different young pokemon at the same time, there shouldn’t be any specific issues with Togepi and your team. Dragonite might dislike it initially but they’re generally caretakers of all types, even Fairy pokemon. 

As for general tips and advice, introduce them one at a time. Togepi is probably too young to really understand what a “team” is, and multiple introductions at once could be overwhelming for it and will make it difficult to gauge the individual reactions of your team. Phanpy also learn with their nose and considerable strength, so be careful when they’re interacting. After each member of the team has met Togepi, you can socialize them with the party in general at your discretion.

After each member of the team has met Togepi, you can socialize them with the party in general at your discretion.

Phanpy also learn with their nose and considerable strength, so be careful when they’re interacting. After each member of the team has met Togepi, you can socialize them with the party in general at your discretion.

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Altazumadra Altaria, Azumarill and Goodra fusion Fairy/Dragon Type Ability: Fluffy Stats: HP - 105, Atk - 90, Def - 100, SpA -...
caption:
Altazumadra

Altaria, Azumarill and Goodra fusion

Fairy/Dragon Type

Ability: Fluffy

Stats: HP - 105, Atk - 90, Def - 100, SpA - 115, SpD - 160, Spe - 90

The Cloud Creator Pokemon

It creates clouds from its body and releases them into the sky.  A group of Altazumadras can create a spectacular cloud show for others to watch.  It doesn’t wish harm to others and will cry if it sees its friends get hurt.

Request for anon. I hope you like it.

title: Purugly - 432
body:
It binds its body with its tails to make itself look bigger. If it locks eyes, it will glare ceaselessly.

summary: Reshnef is a good boy who just wants to help and loses track of time and Deloris is exasperated that they aren't paid to be a...
body:
Reshnef is a good boy who just wants to help and loses track of time and Deloris is exasperated that they aren’t paid to be a babysitter.

Reshnef always had some kind of Pokemon crawling around near him. He’s not a competitive guy so he gives the little guys some love.

I’ll have to draw Deloris soon. They’re a spite machine.
